name: Wight King

abilities.name: Beheading Strike
abilities.description: If you roll a 6 for the attack roll when making this action, it's damage is doubled.

abilities.name: Implacable Foe
abilities.description: Remove one wound marker from the Wight King's hero card in each End Phase unless it has been grievously wounded. In addition, the Wight King can never be stunned.

renown: If you slay an enemy with Beheading Strike, gain 2 additional renown.
